svg.source:
title: User Repaying Loan Flow User->SMS_Gateway: <Shopkeeper Id, Aadhar> SMS_Gateway->Backend: initiateLoanRepay(fromEntity, aadhar, shopId) Merchant->Backend: initiateLoanRepay(fromEntity, aadhar, shopId) Merchant->User: <request fingerprint> User->Merchant: <provides fingerprint> Merchant->Aadhar_system: <aadhar Auth> Aadhar_system->Merchant: <Auth data, Auth Id> Merchant->Backend: getLoanDetails(Auth data, AuthId, Shopkeeper Id) Backend->User_Contract: getEntityByType() User_Contract->Backend: <list of loans> Backend->LoanContract: getLoanDetails() Backend->Merchant: <reponse to getLoanDetails> User->Merchant: <hand over cash> Merchant->Backend: repayLoan(Auth data, Auth Id, Shopkeeper Id, Repay Amount) Backend->User_Contract: getEntityByType() Backend->LoanContract: isActive() Backend->LoanContract: repayLoan(user address, Loan Amount, Shopkeeper Id, shopKeepr_priv_key) LoanContract->Merchant_Bank_Account_Contract: loanRepayCommission(type, loan amount) Merchant_Bank_Account_Contract->Fund_Contract: loanRepay(shopId, userAddress, loan amount, interest) LoanContract->User_Reputation_Contract: changeReputation(changeType, changeData) LoanContract->Merchant_Reputation_Contract: changeReputation(changeType, changeData) LoanContract->User_Contract: disallow() LoanContract->Backend: <event that loan is repaid> LoanContract->LoanContract: <self destroy>
Backend->User_Bank_Account_Contract: deposit(remaining change after paying loan) User_Bank_Account_Contract->Backend: <event that money is deposited> Backend->Core_Banking: status about closing of loan Backend->Core_Banking: notify that remaining amount after loan is deposited into account Backend->Merchant: <Loan Repay Status> Backend->SMS_Gateway: sendRepayAlert(userId, aadhar number, status, loan amount, change) SMS_Gateway->User: <loan repay status>

text.tspan: repayLoan(Auth data, Auth Id, Shopkeeper Id, Repay Amount)
repayLoan(user address, Loan Amount, Shopkeeper Id, shopKeepr_priv_key)
notify that remaining amount after loan is deposited into account
sendRepayAlert(userId, aadhar number, status, loan amount, change)
